site.name: Matt Ward Coaching
site.footerDisclaimer: Results vary and depend on effort, consistency, training execution, and nutrition habits.

homeCoachFirst.intro: Physique and fat loss coaching with structured training, practical nutrition, and clear accountability. No generic plans, no guesswork.
homeCoachFirst.whatYouGetIntro: Every coaching plan is tailored to your goal, training experience, and schedule. You get direct guidance, not generic templates.
homeCoachFirst.headline: Work 1:1 With Matt Ward
homeCoachFirst.aboutText: Matt coaches clients through physique and fat loss goals with simple structure, weekly check-ins, and realistic habits that are built to last.

programs.headline: Coaching Options
programs.intro: Choose the coaching path that matches your current goal. Every option includes direct support and regular check-ins.

items.title: Physique & Fat Loss
items.description: Build a leaner physique with clear nutrition targets and structured gym sessions.

items.title: Strength & Muscle
items.description: Progressive plans to build strength, muscle, and better training confidence.

items.title: Accountability Coaching
items.description: Weekly structure and support for consistency during busy weeks.

results.headline: Client Progress
results.intro: Physique and fat loss progress examples and coaching check-in outcomes.
testimonials: I lost body fat and felt stronger every week.
Simple plan, clear expectations, consistent progress.
The accountability made the biggest difference.

resultsFirst.headline: Client Progress Speaks For Itself
resultsFirst.intro: This variant leads with transformations and testimonials first. Use this page for A/B testing against the main coach-first homepage.

howItWorksCards.title: Personalized Plan
howItWorksCards.description: Training and nutrition targets are tailored to your starting point and goal.

howItWorksCards.title: Weekly Review
howItWorksCards.description: Adjustments are made based on your check-ins, progress photos, and feedback.

howItWorksCards.title: Direct Support
howItWorksCards.description: Get direct accountability and clear next steps throughout the week.

about.headline: Matt Ward Coaching
paragraphs: Matt is based at PureGym Loughborough and coaches clients through physique and fat loss goals with a practical, no-nonsense approach.
He is Level 2 and Level 3 PT qualified, with a BSc (Hons) in Sports Coaching awarded by Loughborough University.

contact.headline: Apply For Coaching
contact.intro: Fastest route is Instagram DM. You can also send details through the form below for physique and fat loss coaching enquiries.

privacy.headline: Privacy
paragraphs: This site uses Netlify Forms to receive coaching enquiries submitted through the contact page.
Submitted details are used only to respond to enquiries and are not sold to third parties.
